nominationError.description: Indicates whether or not an error occurred in the nomination process

successful.description: Indicates whether or not nomination was successful

status.description: The status of the nominated card: -

description.description: Links to an enum of the status as follows... REQUESTED(0), CARD_NOT_AVAILABLE(1), ACCOUNT_NOT_AVAILABLE(2), DETAILS_NOT_MATCHED(3), VALIDATION(4), NOT_ALLOWED(5), ONBOARDED(6)

timestamp.description: The datetime that the status was last updated

externalKey.description: Unique identifier of the Customer in the source system.  For Iceland Online this corresponds to the SalesForce Id

cardNumber.description: The card number, a unique identifier of the card

style.description: Hardcoded to FOOD_WAREHOUSE but may be used in the future to relate to different images to display on the card

barcode.description: The barcode to be scanned at the POS (the card number with a four digit suffix and a Luhn check digit

scanInStore.description: Whether or not the barcode can be scanned in store

balanceAdjust.description: Whether or not any transactions can be made against the card
